chapter.text: 91|2|yi zhuisui taiyang shi de yueliang fashi,
91|3|yi jieshi taiyang shi de baizhou fashi,
91|4|yi longzhao taiyang shi de heiye fashi,
91|5|yi cangqiong ji qi jianzhu zhe fashi,
91|6|yi dadi ji qi puzhan zhe fashi,
91|8|bing qishi ta shan e zhe fashi,
91|9|fan peiyang ziji di xingling zhe, biding chenggong;
91|10|fan qianghai ziji di xingling zhe, biding shibai.
91|11|Sai mo de ren yi yin guofen er fouren zhenli.
91|12|Dangshi, tamen zhong zui boming zhe mang shang qian lai,
91|13|shizhe jiu dui tamen shuo:“Nimen rang an la de mu tuo ziyou yinshui ba.”
91|14|Dan tamen fouren shizhe er zaisha mu tuo, gu tamen de zhuyin tamen de zuiguo er huimie tamen, shi tamen pubian shounan.
91|15|Ta shi bu gulu na zainan de houguo de.
